items.name: Emerald Canopy Zipline
items.short_description: Soar through the lush rainforest canopy on a thrilling zipline adventure, offering breathtaking aerial views of Saint Kitts' vibrant interior. Experience the island's natural beauty from a unique perspective.
items.address: Wingfield Estate, Old Road Town, Saint Kitts

items.name: Azure Cove Beach Club
items.short_description: A luxurious new beach club offering pristine sands, private cabanas, gourmet dining, and watersports in a secluded bay. Perfect for relaxation and sun-soaked indulgence.
items.address: South East Peninsula Road, Frigate Bay, Saint Kitts

items.name: St. Kitts Sustainable Farm & Culinary Experience
items.short_description: Explore a working organic farm, learn about sustainable agriculture, and participate in a farm-to-table cooking class using fresh, local ingredients. A true taste of island life.
items.address: Estridge Estate, St. Paul's, Saint Kitts

items.name: Majestic Peak Skywalk
items.short_description: A newly constructed skywalk offering unparalleled panoramic views of Mount Liamuiga and the surrounding rainforest. Features accessible pathways and stunning photo opportunities.

items.name: St. Kitts Marine Discovery Center
items.short_description: An interactive center dedicated to marine conservation, featuring aquariums, educational exhibits, and guided snorkeling tours to a newly established artificial reef. Fun for all ages.

items.name: Serenity Springs Thermal Baths
items.short_description: Relax in naturally heated volcanic mineral pools surrounded by lush tropical gardens. Offers therapeutic benefits and a tranquil escape from the everyday.
items.address: Monkey Hill, St. Peter's Parish, Saint Kitts

items.name: Indigo Artisan Village
items.short_description: A vibrant village showcasing local artists, craftspeople, and culinary talents. Browse handmade goods, watch live demonstrations, and enjoy authentic Kittitian food and music.
items.address: Main Street, Dieppe Bay Town, Saint Kitts

items.name: Sugar Cane Adventure Park
items.short_description: A family-friendly adventure park built on a former sugar plantation, featuring ATV tours, obstacle courses, and interactive exhibits on the island's sugar history.

items.name: Rainforest Glamping Retreat
items.short_description: Experience luxury glamping nestled deep within the rainforest, offering unique tented accommodations, guided nature walks, and stargazing. Connect with nature in comfort.

items.name: Sunset Ridge Rooftop Bar & Grill
items.short_description: Perched atop a hill overlooking the Caribbean Sea and Basseterre, this modern rooftop venue offers exquisite dining, craft cocktails, and the best sunset views on the island.
